name: Burn The Corn
description:
GAME FEATURE
-- Casual and fun game play can serve to relieve your daily stress!
-- Smooth and satisfying game pace can help you to get through the boring moments of the day!
-- Fun and intuitive control scheme allows gamer to spark the Magic Flame by touching the screen!
-- Different elements can be used to your advantage to achieve high score!
-- Many adorable and distinctive corn kernels await you to unlock!
-- Sleek game graphics and rich sound effects!
-- No In-App Purchases!
-- Praised by gamers worldwide!
-- Simple and easy to pick up! A game critic said “Even my cat knows how to play~”

STORY
Once upon a time, there lived a party of adorable baby corns who had just one dream - they wanted to become delicious popcorn some day! Unfortunately this dream fell apart when the Evil Moisture attacked and imprisoned the baby corns in the Realm of Moisture.
These baby corns await for the brave Magic Flamers to help them escape and turn them into delicious popcorn!!

Be aware! Evil Moisture will send many Water Babies to stand in your way! These minions from the Realm of Moisture have the power to neutralize your Magic Flame! You should demonstrate your skill by moving around it gracefully while turning the baby corns into delicious popcorn!

There are times when the anxious baby corns burst out all at once! This is the moment where you can use some help from your powerful allies! The Fire Warrior can combine with your Magic Flame to strengthen your power while the Time Wizard can slow down time to give you some breathing room. You will discover many more exciting elements and learn how to use them to your advantage throughout this magical journey!

Now! Let us work together to help the baby corns to make their dreams come true!!
